[[inst_hl_casw]]
==== HL.CASW

*Syntax:* hl.casw<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, SrcD, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_casw.svg[HL.CASW encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* AMO

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"amo_kind": "CAS", "note": "User confirmed A", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AMO"}`
